title: F1 2014- The F1 Show-Bahrain-Force India Special.720p.AC3.TBK
description:
The F1 Show 04.04.14 (Bahrain)

Coverage of the SKY SPORTS F1 SHOW For Bahrain Force India Special 

MAIN FILE DETAILS:

Air Date: 04.04.14
Resolution: 1280x720
Audio: AC3 5.1 Channel Dolby Digital 
Video: H.264 Profile 4.0 High
Container: MKV
Running Time: 47.08
Broadcast Time: 20.00-21.00
Source: Encoded From VU+ Solo2 PVR
Broadcast: Sky Sports F1 HD (UK)
Filesize: 1.18GB

Simon Lazenby & Natalie Pinkham are joined by Force India drivers Nico Hulkenberg and Sergio Perez at Bahrain International Circuit for a Force India Speical.


These video files will play very fluidly with the standard media players such as VLC, WMP, KM Player, WMC, MP-HC.

FOR ALL YOUR LATEST F1 NEWS, GOSSIP, TRACK GUIDES, DISCUSSION & FULL TORRENT & FILESHARE LINKS INFORMATION IN MORE DETAIL, AND ACCESS TO MUCH MORE, PLEASE KEEP YOUR EYE ON MY BLOG See .txt File included


**For anyone having mkv playback issues on Windows 7 or 8, I do recommend installing the Shark Codec Packs which are available free on the link below: http://shark007.net/ (*NOTE: sharks default settings work well for WMP)
